description.displayText: We've had Sharifa for a few years now and we're more than grateful for her, she's super dependable and responsible. We have six kids and they all love her, she's super patient and buy them gifts on holidays and birthdays, she's someone we can always count on regularly , we recommend her highly!
description.originalText: We've had Sharifa for a few years now and we're more than grateful for her, she's super dependable and responsible. We have six kids and they all love her, she's super patient and buy them gifts on holidays and birthdays, she's someone we can always count on regularly , we recommend her highly!

description.displayText: Interview went well, I was in the process of hiring Sharifa and checking references. I told her I would pay for her background check. I submitted the request but oddly she let the request sit for two days which care notified me. Care also said I should reach out but I became apprehensive from the delay in accepting a background check. I decided to close the job and for some apparent reason Sharifa decided to accept the request. The background check is non refundable. This is unacceptable and unprofessional no matter if it's nanny work.
